column4: Oy...ZModem protocol was really really great "back in the day" and I beta-tested it heaps of times on my BBS....
do you still run a BBS?
I mostly connect to entropybbs.co.nz these days
just moved away from vertrauen recently
though, i managed to screw things up with BRE, so i can't play that there until (unless?) the door gets reset.
preferred applications
@ senix
that would depend on your user interface
but it'd be somewhere in a system menu of some kind
Actually - been thinking about setting one up again - JUST LIKE the old days...
if its gnome, i think system -> <something> -> preferred applications
check out the enthral or synchronet packages
both are pretty handy suites that are fairly easy to config the hell out of
Been there done that - working on the new incarnation of VBBS
ahh
cool
nice to see more systems around
i'm waiting to see what people come up with on the new commodore computers from commodore USA
especially once the Commodore OS starts shipping out
for now they're just shipping with ubuntu
We'll find out very soon...very soon.... :)
